summary: Hentai Mixed Armor  conversion for SevenBase MoreBounce with TBBP support.
descriptionHtml:
=====================================
=== Hentai Mixed Armor Conversion ===


--- Author's ---
CBBE (Original mod): Mr.Mak
Sevenbase Bombshell: Crazy1918

--- What's in it ---
-Body: SevenBase MoreBounce.
-WeightSlider: Support only 0 and 100, sorry guys.
-TBBP: yes.


--- Installation ---
Unpack in your skyrim data folder.


--- Requirements ---
-Skeleton which supports TBBP such as XP32's
-The TBBP animation of Dragonfly with butt bounce (do not install the skeletons!!!, just the animations).


--- Acquisition ---
-Forgeable at any forge.
-Or use the console, in game use the key "Â²" and type "help mixed" then "player.additem xxxxxx 1".


--- Credits ---
-Mr.Mak07 for this armor.
-Mr.Hentai.
-Sevennity, Demonhunter, Crosscrusade and wast for the amazing sevenBase Bombshell.


--- Permissions ---
Please feel free to convert it for another body, improve it, upload it to another site or even sell it if you must, you have my blessing.


--- Troubleshotings ---
Everything work fine except for the weightslider, for some reason the top of the armor get deformed when using other weight than 0 or 100.
I don't know why this happen and how to fix it, i tried everything i know without success, so i am open to any suggestion.
===============
author: Crazy1918
